duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct outbound prospecting and demonstrate success in closing new business.
Build rapport with potential customers and conduct in-depth customer needs analysis.
Effectively onboard customers and close new business.
Promote Torch’s platform and close accounts using proven sales strategies.
Own territory and have the opportunity to grow into a strategic role with organizational ownership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
